item.title: Family offices bid for top talent: Here's what to know
item.description: The war for talent in the world of finance usually means big salaries, and that is showing up at family offices. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box...

item.title: Gucci sales plunge 25% in the second quarter as woes persist at luxury giant Kering
item.description: Gucci sales, which make up nearly half of total group revenues, plunged 25% over the quarter to 1.46 billion euros.

item.title: Paris Hilton's $63 million mansion deal helps power LA real estate market
item.description: Los Angeles real estate dominated the list of the top 10 most expensive homes sold in June, according to Redfin.

item.title: LVMH-backed investor group takes 20% stake in private jet company Flexjet
item.description: CNBC's Robert Frank reports on news regarding private equity's investment in the private flight industry.

item.title: Luxury shopper recovery faces four key headwinds
item.description: Luxury stocks climbed Friday as investors bet on the emergence of green shoots of recovery within the sector.
